entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 50
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS AROUND 70
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
